title: Projects
subtitle: Select a project to start working with Claude Code

messages.no_recent_projects_description: Open a project to get started with Claude Code
messages.failed_load_projects: Failed to load projects. Please ensure ~/.claude directory exists.
messages.failed_load_sessions: Failed to load sessions for this project.
messages.claude_file_editor_not_implemented: Claude file editor not yet implemented in tabs
messages.click_to_start: Click to start a new project
messages.local_settings_not_in_gitignore: Local settings file is not in .gitignore

commands.title: Project Slash Commands
commands.description: Custom commands that are specific to this project. These commands are stored in .claude/slash-commands/ and can be committed to version control.

project_hooks.title: Project Hooks
project_hooks.description: These hooks apply to all users working on this project. They are stored in .claude/settings.json and should be committed to version control.

local_hooks.title: Local Hooks
local_hooks.description: These hooks only apply to your machine. They are stored in .claude/settings.local.json and should NOT be committed to version control.
